## MouseButton enum

Mouse buttons that can be sent to a virtual machine through [VM.sendMouseDownEvent()](./vm-providers.vm.sendmousedownevent.md) and [VM.sendMouseUpEvent()](./vm-providers.vm.sendmouseupevent.md)<!-- -->.
